bayou.websocket

Class WebSocketResponse.Reject

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayou.websocket.WebSocketResponse
      • bayou.websocket.WebSocketResponse.Reject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Async<WebSocketResponse>, AutoAsync<WebSocketResponse>
    Enclosing class:
    WebSocketResponse

    public static class WebSocketResponse.Reject
extends WebSocketResponse
implements AutoAsync<WebSocketResponse>
    To reject the handshake.

    A Reject response contains an HTTP response; the response status code indicates the reason for rejection.

    Note that this class is a subtype of Async<WebSocketResponse>.

    See Also:
    WebSocketResponse.reject(int, String)
